title: Mobile app lost my changes
review_text: Spent 30 minutes editing tasks on the new mobile app while on the train. When I got to the office the changes were gone. This is the third time this month.

title: Need Gantt dependencies
review_text: Love the new Gantt chart but without task dependencies it's just a pretty timeline. When are real dependencies coming?

title: Best PM tool we've tried
review_text: Switched from Asana 6 months ago and haven't looked back. Simple clean and just works for our small team.

title: API v2 broke our integration
review_text: You deprecated API v1 with 30 days notice and the v2 docs are incomplete. Our Zapier workflows have been broken for 2 weeks.

title: Can't figure out custom fields
review_text: Upgraded to Pro specifically for custom fields but can't find where to set them up. Support responded in 3 days which felt slow.

title: Duplicate notifications driving us crazy
review_text: Since the January notification migration everyone on our team gets 2-3 copies of every email notification. We've submitted 4 tickets about this.

title: Simple and affordable
review_text: We're a small nonprofit and CloudTask Core gives us everything we need without the enterprise price tag.

title: Need better time tracking reports
review_text: Time tracking exists but the reports are too basic. Can't break down by project AND team member AND date range.

title: Performance is unacceptable
review_text: Our main project has 600+ tasks and takes 45 seconds to load. At $30/user/month for 150 people this is embarrassing.

title: Gantt chart is a game changer
review_text: Finally we can visualize our project timelines. Dependencies would make it perfect but even without them it's useful.

title: Perfect for our startup
review_text: CloudTask Core is exactly what a 18-person startup needs. No bloat no confusion just task management that works.

title: Mobile app crashes on project switch
review_text: The redesigned mobile app crashes every time I switch between projects quickly. Have to force-close and reopen.

title: API v2 webhook docs are wrong
review_text: Spent a full day trying to set up webhooks with API v2. The documentation examples return 400 errors. Had to reverse-engineer the actual payload format.

title: Want recurring tasks
review_text: We have weekly standup prep and monthly report tasks. Having to manually recreate them every time is tedious.

title: Duplicate email notifications still happening
review_text: We reported duplicate notifications 3 weeks ago. Got a response saying it was fixed but we're still getting doubles on every update.

title: Onboarding was smooth
review_text: Got our whole team set up in under an hour. The Kanban board is intuitive and everyone picked it up immediately.

title: Mobile offline mode is broken
review_text: Edited 5 tasks while offline at a client site. When I reconnected only 2 of them saved. The others just vanished.

title: Need project-level permissions granularity
review_text: We need to restrict certain team members to specific project views. Current permissions are too coarse for our compliance needs.

title: Performance on large projects is terrible
review_text: Our 400-task project takes over 30 seconds to load. We're paying for Pro and can't even load our main project without waiting.

title: Love the simplicity
review_text: After trying Monday.com Notion and ClickUp we landed on CloudTask. It does less but does it well.

title: Notifications sent at wrong times
review_text: Since the notification migration we get email digests at 3 AM instead of 9 AM. The timezone setting seems to be ignored.

title: Support took 5 days to respond
review_text: Opened a ticket about our broken Zapier integration. Got a response 5 days later saying they'd look into it. Still waiting.

title: Gantt view saved our product launch
review_text: Used the new Gantt chart to plan our product launch. Made it easy to see overlapping timelines. Great addition.

title: SSO broke after January update
review_text: Our SAML SSO stopped working after the January mobile app update. Took 3 days of back-and-forth with support to fix. Enterprise customers should not experience this.

title: Great value for money
review_text: We compared 8 PM tools and CloudTask Core was the best value. Free tier covers our basic needs perfectly.

title: Mobile app notifications don't link correctly
review_text: Tapping a notification in the new mobile app takes me to the wrong project or sometimes just the home screen.

title: Need audit log export
review_text: We have audit logs but can't export them. Our compliance team needs to pull these quarterly for SOC 2.

title: AI task suggestions are hit or miss
review_text: The AI suggestions sometimes nail it but often suggest assigning tasks to people who left the project months ago.

title: Duplicate notifications on mobile and email
review_text: Getting the same notification on my phone AND two copies via email. Three alerts for one task update is excessive.

title: Exactly what we needed
review_text: Small marketing agency here. CloudTask is the first PM tool our whole team actually uses daily. Simple wins.

title: Performance degradation is getting worse
review_text: Page load times have increased 3x in the last month for our large projects. We're evaluating alternatives if this isn't fixed soon.

title: Gantt chart needs milestones
review_text: The Gantt view is great but we need milestone markers for key dates. Without them it's hard to see deadlines at a glance.

title: Mobile app drains battery
review_text: Since the redesign the mobile app drains my phone battery noticeably faster. Using about 15% battery in an hour of use.

title: Help docs are outdated
review_text: Tried following the help docs to set up a new workspace. Half the screenshots show the old UI. Got confused multiple times.

title: Duplicate notifications even after fix
review_text: Your team said duplicate notifications were fixed on Jan 20. We're still getting them. Every. Single. Time.

title: Slack integration works great
review_text: Connected CloudTask to Slack and now task updates flow right into our channels. This alone was worth the Pro upgrade.

title: API v2 rate limits are too aggressive
review_text: We hit API rate limits doing basic sync operations. v1 handled our volume fine. v2 throttles us after 100 requests.

title: Mobile app redesign looks great
review_text: The new mobile app looks much more modern. A few quirks but overall a nice improvement in design.

title: Need custom workflow automation
review_text: We want if-then rules like: if task moves to Done then assign review task to QA. Basic automation would be huge.

title: Mobile app lost offline edits again
review_text: Third time losing offline changes. I've stopped trusting the mobile app for anything important.

title: AI suggestions need context awareness
review_text: The AI task suggestion feature suggested I assign a design task to our backend developer. It needs to learn team roles.

title: Pricing increase feels unfair
review_text: I know existing customers are grandfathered but we're adding 30 new employees and they have to pay the new higher rate. Feels like a bait and switch.

title: Couldn't be happier
review_text: 6 months in and CloudTask is still the best decision we made for project management. Clean simple effective.

title: Performance makes it unusable for real projects
review_text: Any project over 300 tasks is painfully slow. The loading spinner has become our team's most-seen screen.

title: Search doesn't find tasks consistently
review_text: Searched for a task by exact title and got no results. Found it manually by scrolling. Search is unreliable.

title: Triple duplicate notifications
review_text: We're now getting THREE copies of every email notification. This started after the January 15 hotfix.

title: Need dependencies in Gantt
review_text: The Gantt chart would be 10x more useful with task dependencies. Right now I'm manually tracking which tasks block others.

title: Can't delete a workspace
review_text: Tried to delete an old workspace and there's no option. Submitted a support ticket and was told it requires manual intervention.

title: Mobile app sync issues after redesign
review_text: Tasks I complete on mobile still show as open on desktop. Takes 5-10 minutes to sync sometimes.

title: Need time tracking integration with payroll
review_text: Time tracking is nice but we need to export hours in a format compatible with ADP or Gusto for payroll.

title: API v2 migration was a disaster
review_text: No migration guide. Incomplete docs. Changed field names without mapping. This is how you lose developer trust.

title: My team actually uses it
review_text: We've tried 4 PM tools. CloudTask is the first one the whole team adopted without me having to nag anyone.

title: AI suggestions are improving
review_text: The AI task assignment suggestions were bad at first but they're getting better as it learns our team patterns.

title: Notifications timezone bug confirmed
review_text: Ran tests and confirmed: notification timezone is always UTC regardless of user settings. Enterprise bug report #4521.

title: Need subtask progress rollup
review_text: Want parent tasks to show percentage complete based on their subtasks. Currently it's all manual.

title: Simple onboarding
review_text: Got our team up and running in 45 minutes. The UI is clean enough that nobody needed training.

title: Large project performance is a dealbreaker
review_text: We're an Enterprise customer with 500+ task projects. The 40-second load time is actively hurting our productivity. Evaluating Jira.

title: Mobile app crashes on file attachment
review_text: Every time I try to attach a photo from my camera roll the app crashes. iPhone 15 Pro iOS 17.3.

title: Support response time declining
review_text: Used to get support responses within 24 hours. Last 3 tickets took 3-5 days each. What changed?

title: Gantt chart is promising
review_text: Nice start on the Gantt view. For Enterprise we really need: dependencies milestones and resource allocation. Then it'd replace MS Project.

title: Best free PM tool
review_text: The Core plan gives us more than most tools' paid plans. List view and Kanban are both excellent.

title: Duplicate notification nightmare
review_text: Our team of 60 now wastes time reading duplicate notifications to figure out which is the real update. This is a serious productivity drain.

title: Need board view customization
review_text: Want to customize Kanban columns beyond the default statuses. We use a different workflow than Todo/Doing/Done.

title: Enterprise SLA not being met
review_text: Priority support with 4-hour SLA. Our last 5 tickets averaged 18 hours for first response. This is a contract violation.

title: GitHub integration works perfectly
review_text: Connected our repos to CloudTask and now PRs automatically update task statuses. Developer team loves it.

title: Help center search is broken
review_text: Searched 'how to invite team members' in help center and got zero results. Had to Google it instead.

title: API v2 broke our entire workflow
review_text: We built our onboarding automation on API v1. The v2 migration broke it and your docs don't cover our use case at all.

title: Need portfolio-level views
review_text: We manage 40+ projects. Need a portfolio dashboard showing status of all projects at once without clicking into each one.

title: Mobile push notifications stopped
review_text: Haven't received a push notification on the new mobile app in a week. Checked settings and everything is enabled.

title: Switched from Trello no regrets
review_text: CloudTask's free tier is better than Trello's. More features better UI and faster performance.

title: AI suggestions should explain reasoning
review_text: The AI suggests task assignments but doesn't tell me WHY. A brief explanation would help me trust its recommendations.

title: Performance makes us look unprofessional
review_text: Had to wait 30 seconds for a project to load during a client meeting. Switched to showing a spreadsheet instead. Embarrassing.

title: Mobile app logout loop
review_text: After the redesign I get logged out of the mobile app every few hours. Have to re-enter credentials constantly.

title: Reliable and simple
review_text: We don't need bells and whistles. CloudTask does task management right without overcomplicating things.

title: Waited a week for billing question
review_text: Asked a simple billing question about upgrading seats. Took 7 days for a response. Unacceptable.

title: Duplicate notifications after the fix again
review_text: Your Jan 10 patch was supposed to fix duplicates. It worked for 2 days then they came back worse than before.

title: Gantt chart is exactly what we needed
review_text: Our clients always ask for timeline views. The new Gantt chart lets us share beautiful project timelines.

title: Need custom notification rules
review_text: I want to be notified about high-priority tasks only. Currently it's all or nothing.

title: New pricing tiers are confusing
review_text: Tried to add 10 seats and the pricing page shows 3 different rates depending on billing cycle commitment and add-ons. Just tell me the price.

title: Love the mobile app redesign
review_text: The new mobile app is so much faster than the old one. Fresh design and the swipe actions are intuitive.

title: Performance regression is real
review_text: Our project load times went from 5 seconds to 35 seconds over the past 2 months. Something is seriously wrong on the backend.

title: Mobile app doesn't show custom fields
review_text: Upgraded to Pro for custom fields but they don't appear in the mobile app at all. Desktop only apparently.

title: Need advanced analytics
review_text: The basic reporting is fine for small teams but we need cohort analysis velocity tracking and predictive completion dates.

title: Perfect for freelancers too
review_text: I'm a solo consultant managing 8 client projects. CloudTask Core handles it all beautifully.

title: Lost 2 hours of work on mobile
review_text: Was doing a detailed task breakdown on the mobile app during a flight. Landed and everything was gone. I'm done using mobile for real work.

title: Need SCIM provisioning
review_text: Managing 170 users manually is painful. We need SCIM support for automatic provisioning from Okta.

title: AI suggestions getting smarter
review_text: Noticed the AI task suggestions have gotten noticeably better in the last month. Assigned the right person 4 out of 5 times today.

title: API rate limiting is crippling our integration
review_text: Our daily sync pulls 500 tasks. With v2 rate limits we have to spread it over 2 hours. v1 did it in 5 minutes.

title: Can't find how to archive completed projects
review_text: Finished a project and want to archive it not delete it. Can't find the option anywhere. Help docs don't mention it.

title: Notification emails going to spam
review_text: Since the new notification system half our team's CloudTask emails go to spam. The new sending domain isn't whitelisted.

title: Google Drive integration is seamless
review_text: Attached a Google Doc to a task and it embedded perfectly. Team can preview without leaving CloudTask.

title: Just works
review_text: No learning curve no feature overload no nonsense. CloudTask Core is project management done right.

title: Enterprise support is not enterprise quality
review_text: Paying $30/user for 180 people. Our dedicated account manager changed 3 times in 6 months. No continuity.

title: Search results miss recent tasks
review_text: Created a task 10 minutes ago and search can't find it. Seems like there's an indexing delay.

title: Mobile app freezes on large task lists
review_text: Scrolling through a list of 200+ tasks on the mobile app causes it to freeze for 5-10 seconds.

title: Want conditional custom fields
review_text: Need custom fields that appear based on other field values. Example: if Priority is Critical then show Escalation Contact field.

title: Clean UI is refreshing
review_text: Coming from Jira which looks like it was designed by committee CloudTask's clean interface is a breath of fresh air.

title: Notification spam is out of control
review_text: Getting 50+ duplicate emails a day from CloudTask. I've had to create a filter to auto-archive them. Defeats the purpose.

title: Performance worse during business hours
review_text: Our 500+ task projects load in 10 seconds at midnight but 45+ seconds during 9-5. Clearly a capacity issue.

title: Need task templates
review_text: We create similar task sets every sprint. A template feature would save us an hour every two weeks.

title: Great for remote teams
review_text: Our distributed team across 3 timezones uses CloudTask to stay aligned. The simplicity means everyone's on the same page.

title: AI task suggestions are a nice touch
review_text: Not perfect but the AI suggestions save me time on task assignment. Appreciate that you're innovating here.

title: Audit log gaps during notification migration
review_text: Our audit logs have a 4-hour gap from January 2 during what appears to be the notification system migration. Compliance issue.

title: Need dark mode
review_text: My whole workflow is dark mode except CloudTask. It's blinding at night.

title: Mobile app shows stale data
review_text: The mobile app regularly shows task statuses that are hours old. Have to pull-to-refresh constantly.

title: Performance is driving us to competitors
review_text: We've had 3 department heads ask me to switch tools because of CloudTask's load times. This is urgent.

title: Kanban view is best in class
review_text: Simple draggable intuitive. CloudTask's Kanban implementation is the best I've used and I've tried a dozen tools.

title: Support doesn't understand API issues
review_text: Reported an API v2 bug and the support agent clearly didn't understand the technical issue. Got a canned response about clearing my cache.

title: Mobile offline lost my meeting notes
review_text: Used the mobile app to take meeting notes in task comments while at a site with no wifi. All gone when I reconnected.

title: Need resource management
review_text: Want to see team member workload across projects. Who's overloaded? Who has capacity? Currently impossible.

title: Gantt chart fills a huge gap
review_text: We've been manually creating timelines in Google Sheets. The new Gantt chart eliminates that entirely.

title: Solid reliable tool
review_text: 12 months of daily use and CloudTask has never gone down on us. That reliability matters more than fancy features.

title: New pricing for added seats is steep
review_text: We're grandfathered on old pricing but every new hire costs 40% more per seat. Makes budget planning difficult.

title: Gantt chart dates off by one day
review_text: Tasks on the Gantt chart show as starting one day later than their actual start date. Small but annoying.

title: Duplicate email notifications started
review_text: Just started getting 2 copies of every email notification today. Checked settings and everything looks normal.

title: Need custom dashboards
review_text: The default dashboard doesn't show the metrics our leadership cares about. Need drag-and-drop dashboard builder.

title: File attachments work perfectly
review_text: Easy to attach screenshots mockups and docs to tasks. Simple feature but it works flawlessly.

title: API v1 deprecation timeline was too short
review_text: 30 days to migrate complex integrations? Our team needed 90 minimum. Now we're scrambling during the holidays.

title: AI should suggest due dates
review_text: The AI suggests assignees but not due dates. Based on similar past tasks it should be able to estimate timelines.

title: Mobile app crashes on Enterprise SSO login
review_text: SSO users can't use the new mobile app reliably. Crashes during SAML redirect about 50% of the time.

title: Our whole agency loves it
review_text: 30-person agency managing 20+ client projects. CloudTask keeps everyone organized without the complexity of enterprise tools.

title: Support escalation process unclear
review_text: Asked for my ticket to be escalated and was told there's no formal escalation process. At Pro pricing there should be.

title: Mobile app navigation confusing after redesign
review_text: The new mobile layout moved everything around. Settings are buried 3 levels deep. Old version was more intuitive.

title: Need webhook reliability improvements
review_text: Our webhooks from API v2 fail silently about 10% of the time. Need retry logic and delivery confirmations.

title: Minimal but powerful
review_text: CloudTask proves you don't need 500 features to be a great PM tool. Every feature it has works well.

title: Mobile app won't load images in comments
review_text: Images attached to task comments show as broken icons in the mobile app. Have to switch to desktop to see them.

title: Performance SLA violations
review_text: Loading a 400-task project takes 35 seconds consistently. Our Enterprise SLA guarantees sub-5-second page loads.

title: AI task suggestions save time
review_text: Used AI suggestions for sprint planning this week. Saved about 30 minutes of manual assignment work.

title: Holiday support response missing
review_text: Submitted a ticket on Dec 23 and still no response. Understand holidays but a 48-hour auto-response would help.

title: Need Slack two-way sync
review_text: Can push CloudTask updates to Slack but can't create tasks from Slack messages. Need two-way integration.

title: Mobile app deleted my task accidentally
review_text: Swiped to dismiss a notification and it deleted a task instead. The swipe gesture zones are too close together.

title: Notification migration was poorly communicated
review_text: Found out about the notification system change from the duplicate emails not from any announcement. Where was the changelog?

title: Great first impression
review_text: Signed up yesterday and already have our team's projects set up. Fastest onboarding experience ever.

title: Need Sprint/iteration support
review_text: We run 2-week sprints. Need a proper sprint container that auto-rolls incomplete items to the next sprint.

title: Duplicate notifications on task creation
review_text: Creating a new task sends 2 email notifications to every watcher. Just the creation event not updates.

title: Gantt chart view is beautiful
review_text: Showed the Gantt chart to our CEO and she was impressed. First time she's been excited about a PM tool.

title: Can't bulk import tasks
review_text: Trying to import 200 tasks from a CSV. No bulk import feature. Support said to use the API which I don't have on Core.

title: Mobile app loses position when switching apps
review_text: Switch to check email and come back to CloudTask mobile and it reloads from the top of my task list. Loses scroll position every time.

title: Need time-in-status reporting
review_text: Want to know how long tasks sit in each status. Average time in Review is killing our velocity but I can't prove it.

title: Three months of performance issues
review_text: We've reported slow loading 3 times. Each time told 'we're working on it.' It's been 3 months. Are you actually working on it?

title: Beautiful design
review_text: CloudTask is the best-designed PM tool on the market. Clean modern and a pleasure to use daily.

title: AI should predict task blockers
review_text: The AI suggests assignments but could it predict which tasks are likely to get blocked? That would be genuinely useful.

title: Performance degrades throughout the day
review_text: Fresh in the morning at 8 AM loads are fast. By 2 PM the same projects take 4x longer. Server capacity issue.

title: Worth every penny
review_text: Upgraded from Core to Pro and the integrations alone justified the cost. Slack and GitHub integration are excellent.

title: Mobile app task creation missing fields
review_text: Creating a task on mobile only lets me set title and assignee. No priority no due date no labels. Have to finish on desktop.

title: Need approval workflows
review_text: Tasks that need manager sign-off have no formal approval mechanism. We're using comments which is messy.

title: Replaced our whiteboard
review_text: We used to have a physical Kanban board. CloudTask's digital version is better in every way and our remote team can see it.

title: Duplicate notifications triggered by comments
review_text: Every comment on a watched task sends 2 email notifications. With an active discussion thread I got 24 emails for 12 comments.

title: Need board-level WIP limits
review_text: We practice Kanban and need WIP limits per column. Without them our In Progress column overflows constantly.

title: Enterprise performance is a joke
review_text: Pay the highest tier and get the worst performance because we have the most tasks. How does that make sense?

title: AI suggestions surprised me
review_text: The AI correctly identified that our QA tasks should go to Jamie based on past patterns. Didn't expect it to be that smart.

title: FAQ doesn't answer my question
review_text: Tried to find info about storage limits on Core. FAQ doesn't mention it. Had to email support for a basic pricing page question.

title: Mobile app widget stopped updating
review_text: The iOS home screen widget showing my tasks stopped updating after the app redesign. Shows tasks from 2 weeks ago.

title: Need cross-project dependencies
review_text: We manage related projects and need task dependencies ACROSS projects not just within one project.

title: Gantt chart is my new favorite view
review_text: As a PM the Gantt chart gives me exactly the visibility I need. Clean implementation even if dependencies are missing.

title: Set it and forget it
review_text: No maintenance no learning curve no headaches. CloudTask just works month after month.

title: Price increase announcement was buried
review_text: Found out about the pricing change from my billing team not from CloudTask. A direct email to account owners would have been professional.

title: Time tracking doesn't pause when switching tasks
review_text: If I'm tracking time on Task A and switch to Task B it doesn't auto-pause A. End up with inflated hours.

title: Mobile offline changes conflict on sync
review_text: Made changes offline and a colleague made changes online. When I synced the app overwrote their changes without any merge prompt.

title: Need API v2 batch operations
review_text: API v2 has no batch endpoint. To update 50 tasks I need 50 individual API calls. v1 had batch support.

title: Better than Monday.com for small teams
review_text: We tried Monday.com and it was overkill. CloudTask gives us what we actually use at a fraction of the price.

title: API v1 sunset killed our automation
review_text: Our CI/CD pipeline used API v1 to create deployment tasks. Pipeline has been broken for a week. Nobody on your support team understands our use case.

title: Need email-to-task conversion
review_text: Clients email us requests constantly. A forward-to-CloudTask email address that creates tasks would save hours weekly.

title: Mobile SSO redirect broken on Android
review_text: SSO login on Android mobile app fails with a white screen after SAML redirect. Works fine on iOS.

title: Can't believe this is free
review_text: CloudTask Core has features that competitors charge $10/user for. Amazing value.

title: Support agent gave wrong information
review_text: Was told custom fields could be used in automation rules. Spent an hour setting it up only to find out it's not supported.

title: Mobile app background refresh fails
review_text: The app doesn't refresh data in the background. Every time I open it I see stale data and have to manually refresh.

title: Need role-based home dashboards
review_text: Engineers and PMs need different default views. Currently everyone sees the same dashboard regardless of role.

title: Task management done right
review_text: Simple task creation good due date handling clear priority system. The basics done exceptionally well.

title: Duplicate notification for status changes
review_text: Changed a task from In Progress to Done. Got 2 emails: one for the status change and one identical duplicate.

title: Performance has been degrading for months
review_text: I've tracked load times for our main project: Oct 8s Nov 15s Dec 30s. Clear regression that's being ignored.

title: AI suggestions learning from our patterns
review_text: After 2 months the AI suggestions are noticeably better. It's actually learning which developers handle which types of tasks.

title: No phone support option
review_text: Had an urgent issue and could only submit a ticket. For time-sensitive problems email support doesn't cut it.

title: Need form submissions for task creation
review_text: Want external stakeholders to submit requests via a form that auto-creates tasks. Like Jira's request portal.

title: Notification digest includes completed tasks
review_text: The daily digest email includes tasks I already completed. Makes it useless because I have to mentally filter out old items.

title: Gantt view for client presentations
review_text: Used the Gantt chart in a client meeting and they loved the visual timeline. Professional and clean.

title: Zero complaints from the team
review_text: Rolled out CloudTask 4 months ago. Not a single complaint from any team member. That's never happened with a new tool.

title: Need SLA tracking per task
review_text: We have SLA commitments to clients. Need a field that tracks time-to-resolution against an SLA target.

title: Mobile push notifications delayed by hours
review_text: Get push notifications 2-3 hours after the actual event. By then I've already seen it on desktop.

title: AI should suggest task priorities
review_text: AI suggests assignees but not priorities. Based on project deadlines and dependencies it should help prioritize.

title: Pricing transparency needs work
review_text: Enterprise pricing page says 'contact sales' but our sales rep took 2 weeks to respond with a quote. Just publish the price.

title: Great mobile experience now
review_text: The redesigned mobile app is fast and clean. Checking tasks on the go is finally a good experience.

title: API v2 changes broke 3 of our integrations
review_text: GitHub integration custom Slack bot and reporting dashboard all broke when you deprecated v1. This is unacceptable.

title: Need calendar view
review_text: Kanban list and Gantt are great but I also need a calendar view to see tasks by due date. Basic feature that's missing.

title: Performance during peak hours is terrible
review_text: Between 10 AM and 2 PM ET our large projects are nearly unusable. Off-hours performance is fine.

title: Recommended to 3 other teams
review_text: Love CloudTask so much I've recommended it to 3 other teams in our company. They all signed up.

title: Support tier confusion
review_text: Opened a ticket as Pro user and got a Core-level response template. Doesn't feel like my Pro subscription matters.

title: Gantt chart was worth the wait
review_text: Been asking for Gantt for over a year. The implementation is clean and fast. Just need dependencies and it's perfect.

title: Notification preferences reset after migration
review_text: The January notification migration reset all our users' notification preferences to defaults. 165 people had to reconfigure.

title: Need task dependencies outside of Gantt
review_text: Task dependencies should exist as a core feature not just a Gantt visualization thing. Block/unblock should work in list and board views too.

title: Importing from Trello was painless
review_text: Used the import tool to bring over 500 cards from Trello. Everything came through perfectly.

title: Mobile app can't create tasks offline
review_text: Tried to create a new task while offline and got an error. Editing works offline but creation doesn't.

title: Need compliance reporting templates
review_text: We need SOC 2 and ISO 27001 report templates for audit logs. Currently exporting raw data and formatting manually.

title: Performance problems ignored for months
review_text: Submitted my first performance complaint in September. It's December and nothing has improved. Lost all trust.

title: Simple and it stays simple
review_text: 6 months and you haven't bloated the Core plan with unnecessary features. Thank you for keeping it focused.

title: AI needs to learn from our corrections
review_text: When I override an AI suggestion it should learn from that. Same wrong suggestion keeps coming back.

title: Duplicate notifications on @mentions
review_text: Get 2 email notifications every time someone @mentions me in a comment. One is enough.

title: Best Kanban implementation
review_text: Tried 6 different tools. CloudTask has the smoothest most intuitive Kanban board by far.

title: Need better onboarding docs for teams
review_text: The getting started guide is for individuals. Need a team admin setup guide covering workspaces permissions and invites.

title: We expect more at Enterprise pricing
review_text: $30/user/month should mean premium performance premium support and premium features. Right now we get premium pricing with Pro-level experience.
